meanings.definition: Belief in the reliability, truth, ability, or strength of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She has complete trusts in her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The community trusts the local police to keep them safe.
meanings.sent3: The puppy trusts that its owner will always come back home.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of doubts, her trusts in humanity never wavered.
meanings.sent5: His unwavering trusts in his team led them to victory.

meanings.definition: A legal arrangement in which a person or organization controls property or funds for the benefit of another.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer manages the trusts for the wealthy family.
meanings.sent2: Many people set up trusts to secure their children's future.
meanings.sent3: The trust fund baby never had to worry about money.
meanings.sent4: The company's success was built on the trust of its investors.
meanings.sent5: The charitable trust distributed funds to various causes.
